name: proof-editor
description: Visual formal reasoning tool for constructing logical arguments

scripts.pretest: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.cleanup: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run type-check
scripts.deps:report:
echo '=== DEPENDENCY ANALYSIS ===' && echo '
--- Circular Dependencies ---' && npm run deps:circular && echo '
--- Orphaned Modules ---' && npm run deps:orphans && echo '
--- Full Dependency Tree ---' && npm run deps
scripts.llm:prepare:
npm run llm:analysis && echo '
✅ LLM analysis input ready!' && echo 'Upload llm-analysis-input.json and llm-analysis-summary.md to your LLM.' && echo 'Choose from prompts: DDD analysis, Security review, Performance audit, or General code analysis'
scripts.llm:prompts: echo 'Available analysis prompts:' && echo '• scripts/prompts/llm-ddd-analysis-prompt.md - Domain-Driven Design analysis' && echo '• scripts/prompts/general-code-analysis.md - Comprehensive code review' && echo '• scripts/prompts/security-focused-analysis.md - Security vulnerability assessment' && echo '• scripts/prompts/performance-audit.md - Performance optimization review'
